text: Maxine Elizabeth Dexter (n√©e Johnson, born December 5, 1972) is an American physician and politician. She is the U.S. representative for Oregon's 3rd congressional district since 2025. She is a member of the Democratic Party. She was a member of the Oregon House of Representatives from 2020 to 2024. ==References== ==Other websites== * Campaign website * Legislative website * Medical website Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Oregon Category:Politicians from Washington (state) Category:American physicians Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Portland, Oregon
title: Maxine Dexter
